root: ^Greetings, want to know more about the Memory Chip material for your RAM?

c-0: ^Memory Chip can be obtained when defeating enemies in this world.
^The memory chips used in RAM (Random Access Memory) are primarily made from materials optimized for storing and processing digital information at high speeds.
^The core component of a memory chip is the semiconductor, typically made of silicon which serves as the primary material for all modern integrated circuits, just like RAM chips.
^Other than the different types of Silicon like, Doped Silicon, Polysilicon, and Silicon Dioxide.
^It also contains Metal and Passivation Layers, Dielectric, Photoresist, Packaging, and Conductive Materials.
^This makes RAM handle high-speed data transfers efficiently and reliably.
^Yes, because both of them have integrated circuit. speaker: Jherico
^I appreciate your cooperation. Take care on your adventure. speaker: Jherico
c-1: ^No worries, Take care on your adventure. speaker: Jherico
